values.activities: ASCIE: Association of Graduate Students in Computer Information Science and Engineering
Presented paper on “Seamless Roaming- Future of Mobile Computing” at 20th student convention, Computer Society of India.

values.summary: Software Engineer in the Data Services Platform team
values.title: Software Engineer

values.summary:
Competitive Analysis Data Management System

•	Responsible for implementing an effective solution for storing, processing and retrieving competitive analysis data. This system forms the basis for statistical analysis of competitive data for the company.
•	Responsible for designing key parts of the system including the user interface for data entry, custom reporting and tools for inventory control.
• Implemented login monitoring & access control , and performed query optimization on the backend database. Implemented robust-error handling mechanism to handle exceptional system usage and performed unit, integration and system testing on the system.
•	Guided intern candidates on design & implementation of the system.
values.title: Software Tools Developer

values.summary:
•	Designed and created Entity-Attribute-Value based  datastore for storing device and test related information 
•	Designed, implemented and tested an application to load test data from various file formats onto SQL Server and developed a user friendly web interface to run dynamic queries, retrieve and view information in various formats using ASP.NET and C#
values.title: Software Engineering Intern

values.summary:
Worked on two projects: Aero Product Data Management for Honeywell Aerospace, and HUGIN Data Warehouse for Standard and Poor's

•	Developed and maintained Aero PDM data warehouse and on-demand reports for product data management system that aids Honeywell in informed decision making in their business related to avionics. Developed and maintained hugin data warehouse  and  custom  reports for credit rating system that aids S&P in their market data analysis 

•	Participated in all stages of software development life cycle for both projects; individual responsibilities included cleansing and loading relational and XML data onto the enterprise data warehouse using ETL tools, developing SQL procedures to support ETL processes, and creation,  testing and maintenance of Business Objects universe and  reports.
values.title: Software Engineer
